Constructor Detail

Job

public Job(Configuration c,
           Query q,
           int id)
Creates a Job Object with the Configuration field set equal to the first parameter and the Query Object set equal to the second parameter

Parameters:
c - the Job's Configuration
q - the Job's Query
Method Detail

performJob

public void performJob()
Retreives all the appropriate sequence information, applies the appropriate filters, prints out all the sequences and remaining valid oligos in the console

doJob

public java.lang.String doJob()
Retrieves the Sequence Data corresponding to the Job's Query. Parses the sequence into an ArrayList of Oligos. Goes through the Configuration's List of Filters and applies each filter to the list of oligos

Returns:
The Query's corresponding sequence and the list of Oligos that were not filtered out by all the Filters

completeJob

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> completeJob()
Retrieves the sequence data corresponding to the Job's Query, Parses the sequence into an ArrayList of Oligos, filters the oligos. It then returns an ArrayList of Strings. The first string is the Query Sequence. The second String contains all the oligos that have been filtered. They are grouped based on what filter they were rejected by, and the file contains statistics on how many oligos were rejected by each filter. the 3rd string contains all the remaining valid oligos, grouped by what Query sequence they came from.

Returns:
- An ArrayList of String containing the Query Sequence, the invalid oligos, and the valid oligos

produceFastas

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> produceFastas()

public int getID()
Retrieves the Configuration' unique ID Number

Returns:
the configuration ID Number

public java.lang.String getConfigurationID()

getQueryID

public java.lang.String getQueryID()
Retrieves the Unique ID of the Query Object contained in the Job

Returns:
the Query ID

toXML

public java.lang.String toXML()
Creates an XML tag signifying the start of a Job Object and SubSequent Tags denoting the ID's of the Query and Configuration contained in the Job Object

Returns:
an XML representation of the Job Object

oligosToString

private java.lang.String oligosToString(java.util.ArrayList<Oligo> oligos,
                                        boolean rejected)
Creates a string representation of an ArrayList of oligos. For each oligo in the list, the method creates a new line of text that contains that Oligo's sequence followed by its ID.

Parameters:
oligos - the ArrayList of Oligos that is to be put into a String form
Returns:
a String representation of the list of Oligos

getJobHeader

private java.lang.String getJobHeader()
Creates a header for each individual Job Object that spceifies the job ID and the ID's of each of the Query and Configuration instance fields

Returns:
a header for the individual Job Object that calls the method
